Container.Description: With unlimited, set-it-and-get-at-it backup to multiple destinations, plus anywhere, anytime access to ALL your files, CrashPlan is the simplest, surest way to protect your digital life.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : path to where the configuration of CrashPlan is stored to.[br] [b]/backups[/b] : target path where incoming backups are store.[br] [b]/unraid[/b] : unraid shares and disks you can use as a source for CrashPlan to backup, this should point to '/mnt'.
